nodes.title: The Quantum Paradox
nodes.content:
You are Dr. Sarah Chen, a quantum physicist at the Temporal Research Institute.
    Late one night, your quantum computer displays unprecedented readings. Three distinct
    anomalies appear on your screen...

nodes.title: Temporal Distortion
nodes.content:
The time dilation readings are off the charts. You notice your watch
    running at different speeds across your field of vision...

choices.text: Attempt to stabilize the temporal field

nodes.title: Master of Time
nodes.content:
Your mastery of temporal mechanics has given humanity control over time itself.
    You've become the first Time Lord of Earth. THE END.

nodes.title: Multiverse Explorer
nodes.content:
You've established stable connections with parallel universes,
    opening up infinite possibilities for humanity. THE END.

nodes.title: Quantum Catastrophe
nodes.content:
Your experiments have caused a cascade of quantum decoherence.
    Reality itself begins to unravel. THE END.
